name: MyBook
description:
Hello everybody!
This is a game I created for the SAFER INTERNET GAME JAM organized by the NGO Youth First.
Play as a famous young blogger in the social media!
The screenshots speak for themselves.
Game engine: RPG MAKER VX ACE
Music and Graphics: By Me (Ramose Tsimbina)
Sound Effects (Free): Internet
Script used:
_Yanfly - Ace message system
_Zerbu - Text sound effect
Enjoy!
Language: French
